TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AsymmetricAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class AsymmetricAlgorithm Implements IDisposable
public ref class AsymmetricAlgorithm abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示非对称算法的所有实现都必须从中继承的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of asymmetric algorithms must inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非对称加密算法，也称为公共密钥算法，需要发送方和接收方维护的相关密钥对： 一个私钥和公钥。Asymmetric cryptographic algorithms, also known as public-key algorithms, require that both sender and receiver maintain a pair of related keys: a private key and a public key. 这两个键是唯一的实体。Both keys are unique to the entity. 公钥可以可供任何人;此密钥用于编码发送给接收方的数据。The public key can be made available to anyone; this key is used for encoding data that is sent to a receiver. 私钥必须保留为私有的接收方;此密钥用于解码的消息编码使用接收方的公钥。The private key must be kept private by the receiver; this key is used for decoding messages encoded using the receiver's public key. 类是公共密钥算法的实现。The class is an implementation of a public-key algorithm. 有关公钥加密算法的深入讨论，请参阅中的"公共密钥加密"一节[加密服务](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md)。For an in-depth discussion of public-key encryption and algorithms, see the "Public-Key Encryption" section in [Cryptographic Services](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md). 有关如何使用强名称工具 (Sn.exe) 创建密钥对的信息，请参阅[如何： 创建公钥 / 私钥对](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-create-a-public-private-key-pair.md)。For information about how to use the Strong Name tool (Sn.exe) to create key pairs, see [How to: Create a Public-Private Key Pair](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-create-a-public-private-key-pair.md). 公钥系统可用于构成数字签名。You can use public-key systems to form digital signatures. 使用数字签名以帮助保护数据的完整性。Digital signatures are used to help to protect the integrity of data. 例如，若要使用的公钥系统以数字方式签署一条消息，发件人首先将哈希函数应用于该消息以创建消息摘要。For example, to use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest. 发送方然后使用发件人的私钥来创建发件人的个人签名加密消息摘要。The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature. 在收到消息和签名，接收方解密签名，使用发件人的公钥进行恢复的消息摘要，并使用发件人使用的同一个哈希算法对消息进行哈希处理。Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used. 如果接收方计算消息摘要与匹配从发送方接收的消息摘要，接收方可以假定该消息在传输过程中未被更改。If the message digest that the receiver computes matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can assume that the message was not altered while in transit. 请注意，任何人都可以验证签名，因为发件人的公钥是常见的知识。Note that anyone can verify a signature, because the sender's public key is common knowledge. 此方法不会保留该邮件; 的秘密性对于要保密的消息，它还必须加密。This technique does not retain the secrecy of the message; for the message to be secret, it must also be encrypted. .NET Framework 提供了以下实现数字签名算法的类： ， ， （基类），和。The .NET Framework provides the following classes that implement digital signature algorithms: , , (base class), and . 命名空间提供了有关具体类和仅。The namespace provides concrete classes for and only. 若要了解如何使用 RSA 算法来加密和解密的 XML 数据，并创建和验证 XML 数字签名，请参阅以下文章：To learn how to use the RSA algorithm to encrypt and decrypt XML data, and create and verify XML digital signatures, see these articles: - [如何：使用非对称密钥加密 XML 元素How to: Encrypt XML Elements with Asymmetric Keys](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-encrypt-xml-elements-with-asymmetric-keys.md) - [如何：使用非对称密钥解密 XML 元素How to: Decrypt XML Elements with Asymmetric Keys](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-decrypt-xml-elements-with-asymmetric-keys.md) - [如何：使用数字签名为 XML 文档签名How to: Sign XML Documents with Digital Signatures](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-sign-xml-documents-with-digital-signatures.md) - [如何：验证 XML 文档的数字签名How to: Verify the Digital Signatures of XML Documents](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-verify-the-digital-signatures-of-xml-documents.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现自定义的非对称算法继承自类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a custom asymmetric algorithm inherited from the class. 提供的其他类是为了演示如何使用自定义类。An additional class is provided to demonstrate how to use the custom class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm/cpp/customcrypto.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm/CS/customcrypto.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm/VB/customcrypto.vb#2)] 下面是另外一个类，演示如何使用自定义类。Here's an additional class that demonstrates how to use the custom class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm/cpp/customcryptoimpl.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm/CS/customcrypto.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm/VB/customcrypto.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对的简单调用方法。This method is a simple call to the method. 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源类可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the class to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法以释放当前资源`customCrypto`对象。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to release the resources of the current `customCrypto` object. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
